Source code for src.registry.helper

  1"""Helper utilities."""
  2
  3from __future__ import annotations
  4
  5import json
  6import uuid
  7from collections.abc import Mapping
  8from typing import Final
  9
 10import duckdb
 11from kgfoundry.kgfoundry_common.models import Doc, DoctagsAsset
 12
 13from kgfoundry_common.navmap_types import NavMap
 14
 15__all__ = ["DuckDBRegistryHelper"]
 16
 17__navmap__: Final[NavMap] = {
 18    "title": "registry.helper",
 19    "synopsis": "Helper utilities that simplify writing records into the DuckDB registry.",
 20    "exports": __all__,
 21    "sections": [
 22        {
 23            "id": "public-api",
 24            "title": "Public API",
 25            "symbols": ["DuckDBRegistryHelper"],
 26        },
 27    ],

[docs]
 32class DuckDBRegistryHelper:
 33    """Describe DuckDBRegistryHelper."""
 34
 35    def __init__(self, db_path: str) -> None:
 36        """Compute init.
 37
 38        Initialise a new instance with validated parameters.
 39
 40        Parameters
 41        ----------
 42        db_path : str
 43            Description for ``db_path``.
 44        """
 45        
 46        
 47        


[docs]
 48        self.db_path = db_path


 49


[docs]
 50    def _con(self) -> duckdb.DuckDBPyConnection:
 51        """Compute con.
 52
 53        Carry out the con operation.
 54
 55        Returns
 56        -------
 57        duckdb.DuckDBPyConnection
 58            Description of return value.
 59        """
 60        return duckdb.connect(self.db_path)


 61


[docs]
 62    def new_run(
 63        self,
 64        purpose: str,
 65        model_id: str | None,
 66        revision: str | None,
 67        config: Mapping[str, object],
 68    ) -> str:
 69        """Compute new run.
 70
 71        Carry out the new run operation.
 72
 73        Parameters
 74        ----------
 75        purpose : str
 76            Description for ``purpose``.
 77        model_id : str | None
 78            Description for ``model_id``.
 79        revision : str | None
 80            Description for ``revision``.
 81        config : Mapping[str, object]
 82            Description for ``config``.
 83
 84        Returns
 85        -------
 86        str
 87            Description of return value.
 88        """
 89        
 90        
 91        
 92        run_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
 93        con = self._con()
 94        con.execute(
 95            (
 96                "INSERT INTO runs "
 97                "(run_id,purpose,model_id,revision,started_at,config) "
 98                "VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?)"
 99            ),
100            [run_id, purpose, model_id, revision, json.dumps(config)],
101        )
102        con.close()
103        return run_id


104


[docs]
105    def close_run(self, run_id: str, success: bool, notes: str | None = None) -> None:
106        """Compute close run.
107
108        Carry out the close run operation.
109
110        Parameters
111        ----------
112        run_id : str
113            Description for ``run_id``.
114        success : bool
115            Description for ``success``.
116        notes : str | None
117            Description for ``notes``.
118        """
119        
120        
121        
122        con = self._con()
123        con.execute("UPDATE runs SET finished_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE run_id=?", [run_id])
124        con.execute(
125            "INSERT INTO pipeline_events VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
126            [
127                str(uuid.uuid4()),
128                "RunClosed",
129                run_id,
130                json.dumps({"success": success, "notes": notes or ""}),
131            ],
132        )
133        con.close()


134


[docs]
135    def begin_dataset(self, kind: str, run_id: str) -> str:
136        """Compute begin dataset.
137
138        Carry out the begin dataset operation.
139
140        Parameters
141        ----------
142        kind : str
143            Description for ``kind``.
144        run_id : str
145            Description for ``run_id``.
146
147        Returns
148        -------
149        str
150            Description of return value.
151        """
152        
153        
154        
155        dataset_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
156        con = self._con()
157        con.execute(
158            (
159                "INSERT INTO datasets "
160                "(dataset_id,kind,parquet_root,run_id,created_at) "
161                "VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)"
162            ),
163            [dataset_id, kind, "", run_id],
164        )
165        con.close()
166        return dataset_id


167


[docs]
168    def commit_dataset(self, dataset_id: str, parquet_root: str, rows: int) -> None:
169        """Compute commit dataset.
170
171        Carry out the commit dataset operation.
172
173        Parameters
174        ----------
175        dataset_id : str
176            Description for ``dataset_id``.
177        parquet_root : str
178            Description for ``parquet_root``.
179        rows : int
180            Description for ``rows``.
181        """
182        
183        
184        
185        con = self._con()
186        con.execute(
187            "UPDATE datasets SET parquet_root=? WHERE dataset_id=?", [parquet_root, dataset_id]
188        )
189        con.execute(
190            "INSERT INTO pipeline_events VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
191            [
192                str(uuid.uuid4()),
193                "DatasetCommitted",
194                dataset_id,
195                json.dumps({"rows": rows, "root": parquet_root}),
196            ],
197        )
198        con.close()


199


[docs]
200    def rollback_dataset(self, dataset_id: str) -> None:
201        """Compute rollback dataset.
202
203        Carry out the rollback dataset operation.
204
205        Parameters
206        ----------
207        dataset_id : str
208            Description for ``dataset_id``.
209        """
210        
211        
212        
213        con = self._con()
214        con.execute("DELETE FROM datasets WHERE dataset_id=?", [dataset_id])
215        con.execute(
216            "INSERT INTO pipeline_events VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
217            [str(uuid.uuid4()), "DatasetRolledBack", dataset_id, "{}"],
218        )
219        con.close()


220


[docs]
221    def register_documents(self, docs: list[Doc]) -> None:
222        """Compute register documents.
223
224        Carry out the register documents operation.
225
226        Parameters
227        ----------
228        docs : List[Doc]
229            Description for ``docs``.
230        """
231        
232        
233        
234        con = self._con()
235        for doc in docs:
236            con.execute(
237                """INSERT OR REPLACE INTO documents
238                (doc_id, openalex_id, doi, arxiv_id, pmcid, title, authors, pub_date, license,
239                 language, pdf_uri, source, content_hash, created_at)
240                VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)""",
241                [
242                    doc.id,
243                    doc.openalex_id,
244                    doc.doi,
245                    doc.arxiv_id,
246                    doc.pmcid,
247                    doc.title,
248                    json.dumps(doc.authors),
249                    doc.pub_date,
250                    doc.license,
251                    doc.language,
252                    doc.pdf_uri,
253                    doc.source,
254                    doc.content_hash or "",
255                ],
256            )
257        con.close()


258


[docs]
259    def register_doctags(self, assets: list[DoctagsAsset]) -> None:
260        """Compute register doctags.
261
262        Carry out the register doctags operation.
263
264        Parameters
265        ----------
266        assets : List[DoctagsAsset]
267            Description for ``assets``.
268        """
269        
270        
271        
272        con = self._con()
273        for asset in assets:
274            con.execute(
275                "INSERT OR REPLACE INTO doctags VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
276                [
277                    asset.doc_id,
278                    asset.doctags_uri,
279                    asset.pages,
280                    asset.vlm_model,
281                    asset.vlm_revision,
282                    asset.avg_logprob,
283                ],
284            )
285        con.close()


286


[docs]
287    def emit_event(self, event_name: str, subject_id: str, payload: Mapping[str, object]) -> None:
288        """Compute emit event.
289
290        Carry out the emit event operation.
291
292        Parameters
293        ----------
294        event_name : str
295            Description for ``event_name``.
296        subject_id : str
297            Description for ``subject_id``.
298        payload : Mapping[str, object]
299            Description for ``payload``.
300        """
301        
302        
303        
304        con = self._con()
305        con.execute(
306            "INSERT INTO pipeline_events VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
307            [str(uuid.uuid4()), event_name, subject_id, json.dumps(payload)],
308        )
309        con.close()
